name: INMATE35
description:
In this 3D game, the player controls an elite SASR soldier, Billy Baine, who has been remanded in prison after false allegations are placed against him. Throughout the game Billy must survive the onslaught of angry inmates who have been paid to take him out. Armed only with the weapons inmates use against him, Billy must use his military finesse to take out the one responsible for placing the bounty on his head. 

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Space - Jump

V - Change Camera Perspective

C - Crouch

Mouse 1 - Shoot

Mouse 2 - Aim

Esc - Pause / Menu / Quit

(More movement to come in future release)

Alpha Note:

-Thanks for supporting us, this is a early prototype of our Games Project at SAE Qantm Sydney. Please note some functions are yet to be implemented, such as High Scores, Options, and limited AI. We hope to finish the project soon. Thanks again.
